abstract: In announcing on Wednesday Johnson & Johnson’s biggest acquisition ever, the company’s chief executive tried to pivot from a year of manufacturing lapses, product recalls and a disappointing share price.
snippet: In announcing on Wednesday Johnson & Johnson’s biggest acquisition ever, the company’s chief executive tried to pivot from a year of manufacturing lapses, product recalls and a disappointing share price.
lead_paragraph: In announcing on Wednesday Johnson & Johnson’s biggest acquisition ever, on the eve of its annual shareholder meeting, the company’s chief executive tried to pivot from a year of manufacturing lapses, product recalls and a disappointing share price.

headline.main: With Deal, J.&J. Tries to Change Discussion
headline.print_headline: With Deal, J.&J. Tries To Pivot

byline.original: By Reed Abelson and Natasha Singer
